ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.managers

Class FavouritesIOManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.managers.FavouritesIOManager

  • public class FavouritesIOManager
extends Object
    Responsible for persistency of favourite threads/comments. Contains methods to Serialize/Deserialize both comments and threads. Is a singleton.

    • Method Summary

      Deserializes the favourited Comments.

      Deserialize ArrayList of favourited ThreadComments from JSON

      Serialize arrayList of threads to JSON.
      void serializeThreads()
      Serializes favourited ThreadComments and stores them in the cache.

      • getInstance

        public static FavouritesIOManager getInstance(Context context)

      • serializeThreads

        public void serializeThreads()
        Serializes favourited ThreadComments and stores them in the cache.

      • serializeFavComments

        public void serializeFavComments()
        Serialize arrayList of threads to JSON. These threadComments are favourited comments converted to ThreadComment to save their replies as well.

      • deSerializeFavComments

        public ArrayList<ThreadComment> deSerializeFavComments()
        Deserializes the favourited Comments.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of the favourited comments as ThreadComments.

        public ArrayList<ThreadComment> deSerializeThreads()
        Deserialize ArrayList of favourited ThreadComments from JSON
        Returns:
        ArrayList of favourited ThreadComments.
